actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend until January 1, 1995, the existing suspensions of duty on tartaric acid, potassium antimony tartrate, and potassium sodium tartrate.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on: (1) tartaric acid; (2) potassium antimony tartrate (tartar emetic); and (3) potassium sodium tartrate (rochelle salts).

titles.title: A bill to extend until January 1, 1995, the existing suspensions of duty on tartaric acid, potassium antimony tartrate, and potassium sodium tartrate.
